effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.legends-arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.legends-arceus: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.sword-shield: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
